constituent: dew, rain, weather, path, wooden leg, mouth, stop, footprint, each, walking legs, mouth, mouth2
koohiiStory1: After the rain the path was covered with dew.
koohiiStory2: Dew forms on the path least weathered.
readingExamples: 露出 (ろしゅつ), 露店 (ろてん), 雨露 (あめつゆ), 露 (つゆ)
words: frank, blunt, plain, outspoken, conspicuous, open, broad, suggestive
